nodes.documentation:
@title Provider
@dev A contract which can be used as a provider in a ProviderRegistry.
nodes.name: Provider

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must be an admin to perform this action."

arguments.value: Must be an admin to perform this action.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must be an admin to perform this action."

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor used for upgrades.
     * @param _providerId The provider id. If set to 0, the provider can be registered.

@dev Add a new admin to this provider
     * @param newAdmin The address of the new admin
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation:
@dev Remove an admin to this provider
     * @param admin The address of the admin to be removed
nodes.name: removeAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Registers this provider with the ProviderRegistry.
nodes.name: registerProvider
performUpgrade
